EmailTemplate.subject: MyAerospace Portal: Order Status Enhancements
EmailTemplate.textOnly: MYAEROSPACE PORTAL | ORDER STATUS ENHANCEMENTS To our Valued Customers, Our goal is to make it easier to do business with Honeywell. The MyAerospace Portal <[[http://www.myaerospace.honeywell.com]]>is your online resource to access technical support, place orders, and manage services. To give you better visibility and control over your orders, we have enhanced our Order Status application user interface and adding visibility to repair orders. These enhancements will reduce your effort and increase order processing speed. Order Summary Intuitive graphs group orders by status for each order category to clearly see status for repairs, spares, and exchange orders. View by-site summaries with interactive breakdowns to navigate directly into areas of interest. Search For Orders Search by a variety of criteria to easily locate your order. Filters make even high order quantities navigable. Have an important order? Follow specific orders to be notified when it has major updates Order Details See status, repair site location, estimated ship date, and where the order is located within our repair process. Edit items such as shipping information and contact email any time before final test/assembly. View specific order details such as serial numbers, service bulletins, and download certifications. Order Documents Access order documents such as: - FAA 8130 certifications (1 time only) - Order quotes - Purchase orders - Shipping documents Configure Notifications Configure how we communicate with you – receive notifications for new orders, spares, repairs, orders with information missing, and even what day of the week Honeywell sends an email. Release Orders on Hold You can now release orders on hold by approving quotes, updating purchase orders or providing missing information.
